column5: I have been thinking about a trip to Lac Seul this upcoming season. We have traditionally fished the Red and Winnipeg in the fall but feel the bite has dropped off and would like to try something new.When I start searching for information, it quickly becomes overwhelming. Can anyone give me an idea of what time of year and what part of the lake I should look at? Focusing on walleye, I think we would like to bring our boat and like everyone, we would like to time it for the best numbers and size.Can you get me started? Thank you very much.
Do a search on "Lac Suel". You should find many posts concerning this topic. Best time>when ever you can be there!
